mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUNER_REVIEW( DEAL_SEQ, WRITER_SEQ, TUNER_SEQ, REVIEW_TECH, REVIEW_PUNCTUAL, REVIEW_KINDNESS, REVIEW_CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDDATE, UPDATER_SEQ )VALUES( #{deal_seq}, #{writer_seq}, #{tuner_seq}, #{review_tech}, #{review_punctual}, #{review_kindness}, #{review_content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{writer_seq} )
